message.content:
Kulungile, ndicela uncedo ngezinto ezimbini:

1. Ukuvula isitshixo: 
   - Xa ufuna ukuvula isitshixo, qokelela phantsi kwelichaphazo. 
   - Hlela phezulu kwesandla sakho esisandla esisodwa, uqonde ukuba kukho isikhala esilandelayo. 
   - Hlela le sachaphazo phezulu kwesitshixo, uqhubeke phantsi ngokupheleleyo. 
   - Qala ukukhomba isisu samavila ekugcineni kwesisandla sakho esisodwa, uqonde ukuba kukho isikhala esilandelayo. 
   - Ndlela elula yokuvula isitshixo yokuba uqonde ukuba kukho isikhala esilandelayo ukuba idlule phezulu kwesitshixo. 

2. Ukuvula isitshixo esisodwa: 
   - Xa ufuna ukuvula isitshixo esisodwa, qokelela phantsi kwelichaphazo. 
   - Hlela phezulu kwesandla sakho esisandla esisodwa, uqonde ukuba kukho isikhala esilandelayo. 
   - Hlela le sachaphazo phezulu kwesitshixo esisodwa, uqhubeke phantsi ngokupheleleyo. 
   - Qala ukukhomba isisu samavila ekugcineni kwesisandla sakho esisodwa, uqonde ukuba kukho isikhala esilandelayo. 
   - Ndlela elula yokuvula isitshixo esisodwa yokuba uqonde ukuba kukho isikhala esilandelayo ukuba idlule phezulu kwesitshixo esisodwa. 

Ndicela undithethe ukuba andilondolozele ukuqondana namanye amazwi ngolwimi lwesiXhosa. Ndiza kukunceda kwaye ndiyakwazi ukuthetha
